channel.title: Web Developement Section
channel.description:
I know there is a web dev section on moparisthebest but it isn't very active. Would be awesome to have one here aswell! :D
EDIT: Maybe throw it in as a sub category of graphics.

item.title: Web Developement Section
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I don’t see much purpose for this. The general discussion and questions boards work fine for this. The website board on MITB has the problem that a lot of people try to use it to advertise their websites. We essentially don’t want to reproduce that here. If you have a question on how to do something, it absolutely fits in general programming or general questions. If you want to discuss awesome new web features, then general discussion works great.

Read full topic
